sentences.sContent: This is a silly and inaccurate way to think about time, however.
sentences.sContent_eng: This is a silly and inaccurate way to think about time, however.
sentences.sCn: 然而，这是一种愚蠢和错误的看待时间的方法。

sentences.sContent: It could also be an invalidation notice specifying that part of data should not be considered in the integration process because it is inaccurate.
sentences.sContent_eng: It could also be an invalidation notice specifying that part of data should not be considered in the integration process because it is inaccurate.
sentences.sCn: 它经常是一个无效的通告，部分的数据集成过程中应该不会被考虑，因为他们是错误的。
